title: Czech MPs support vaccination resolution, rejecting anti-vax claims [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Czech Parliament’s health committee expressed support for the current system of mandatory vaccination in reaction to a controversial anti-vax seminar organised in the Parliament
summary_public: Czech Parliament’s health committee expressed support for the current system of mandatory vaccination in reaction to a controversial anti-vax seminar organised in the Parliament

CZ.label: positive
CZ.evidence: Czech MPs support vaccination resolution, rejecting anti-vax claims
